INSERT INTO MID_PROD_OUT_IOS ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, IN_DATE, CAS_ORG_ID, USE_EMP_NO, STROE_SET_ID, STROE_EMP, OUT_TYPE, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{casOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stroeSetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stroeEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_MID_PROD_OUT_IOS.nextval as id FROM dual

UPDATE MID_PROD_OUT_IOS
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_DATE = #{inDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CAS_ORG_ID = #{casOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USE_EMP_NO = #{useEmpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
